nodes.text: Project Supercharger was a joint project between the Republic Defense Procurement Office of the Galactic Republic and the Corellian Engineering Corporation that was active during the Clone Wars. It aimed to create the Charger c70 retrofit package by upgrading Judicial Consular-class space cruisers into combat frigates.
Project Supercharger was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
